  • Constructor Details

    • GameFacadeController

      public GameFacadeController(GameFacade gameFacade)
      Constructs a GameFacadeController with the specified GameFacade.
      Parameters:
      gameFacade - : GameFacade instance to be used by the controller

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentPlayerPosition

      public Position getCurrentPlayerPosition()
      Retrieves the current position of the player in the labyrinth. This method delegates the call to the game facade to get the current player and then returns the player's current tile position.
      Returns:
      current Position object representing the player's coordinates on the gameboard

    • getCurrentPlayerObjective

      public String getCurrentPlayerObjective()
      Retrieves the current objective of the current player in the game.
      Returns:
      a String representing the description of the current player's objective

    • notifyPlayerPosition

      public void notifyPlayerPosition(Position newPosition)
      Notifies the game facade about a change in the player's position.
      Parameters:
      newPosition - : new Position object representing the player's updated coordinates on the game board

    • notifyPlayerObjective

      public void notifyPlayerObjective(int objective)
      Notifies the game facade about a change in the player's objective.
      Parameters:
      objective - : the new objective index for the player

    • changePlayerPosition

      public void changePlayerPosition(Position newPosition, GameBoardFacadeView gameBoardFacadeView)
      Updates the player's position on the game board.
      Parameters:
      newPosition - : the new position of the player

    • changePlayerObjective

      public void changePlayerObjective(Gameboard gameboard, GameBoardFacadeView gameBoardFacadeView)
      Changes the current objective of the player in the game. This method checks if the player has reached their current objective and, if so, progresses the player to the next objective. Additionally, it validates if the player has completed all objectives.
      Parameters:
      gameboard - : current gameboard containing the layout and objectives
      gameBoardFacadeView - : interface view to facilitate player notifications and updates in the game

    • aAtteintObjectif

      public boolean aAtteintObjectif(Gameboard gameboard)
      Determines whether the current player has reached their objective on the gameboard.
      Parameters:
      gameboard - : current gameboard containing the layout and objectives
      Returns:
      true if the current player's position matches the objective's position, false otherwise

    • changePlayerLastPosition

      public void changePlayerLastPosition(Position position)
      Advances the game to the next player.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Retrieves the current player in the game.
      Returns:
      Player object representing the current player
